channel.title: Open Source Friendly on Indmind Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source Friendly on Indmind Blog

item.title: Rin
item.description: Rin a simple multi-burpose bot Installation Install all dependencies using npm $ npm install Build $ npm run build Development cp .env.example .env add your token to .env use cli.js (process.arv) as input $ STATUS=debug npm start calc 1 + 1 for discord or telegram set TELEGRAM_TOKEN or DISCORD_TOKEN in .env $ npm run dev auto reload (use telegram or discord based on given token) build and start main.js from build
